name: PRE - S - Steel Stud Framing
Details
Steel Stud Dimensions / locations checked & accurate
Steel Studs have been installed square, straight and plumb
Fixings are correct to specification including any seismic/bracing requirements
All Nogs (Service/Specialty) & penetrations - installed, checked & correct (ensure acoustic & fire rating requirements achieved)
All Steel Stud framing completed correctly to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Door Timber studs and lintels installed and level
Window Timber studs, lintels and still installed and level
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
PRE - S - Suspended Ceiling Grids
Details
Ceiling Height confirmed
Bulkheads plumb, level and square (if required)
Battens running in correct directions and orientation for critical light
Batten joins offset
Batten joins flush
All hangers and clips installed
Corners fixed correctly
Appropriate fixings used and installed as per required specification
Angles correct to fix plasterboard
Any seismic requirements and bracing elements installed
Suspended ceiling installation completed and acceptable
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
